1: וַיֵּ֣שֶׁב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>dwelt</n> יַעֲקֹ֔ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>And Jacob</n> בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the land</n> מְגוּרֵ֣י <sup>4033 </sup> <n>was a stranger</n> אָבִ֑יו <sup>1 </sup> <n>wherein his father</n> בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the land</n> כְּנָֽעַן׃ <sup>3667 </sup> <n>of Canaan</n>
2: אֵ֣לֶּה ׀ <sup>428 </sup> <n>These</n> תֹּלְד֣וֹת <sup>8435 </sup> <n>These [are] the generations</n> יַעֲקֹ֗ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>of Jacob</n> יוֹסֵ֞ף <sup>3130 </sup> <n>Joseph</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>old</n> שְׁבַֽע־ <sup>7651 </sup> <n>seven</n> עֶשְׂרֵ֤ה <sup>6240 </sup> <n>teen</n> שָׁנָה֙ <sup>8141 </sup> <n>years</n> הָיָ֨ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> רֹעֶ֤ה <sup>7462 </sup> <n>was feeding</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>with</n> אֶחָיו֙ <sup>251 </sup> <n>with his brethren</n> בַּצֹּ֔אן <sup>6629 </sup> <n>the flock</n> וְה֣וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> נַ֗עַר <sup>5288 </sup> <n>and the lad</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>with</n> בְּנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>[was] with the sons</n> בִלְהָ֛ה <sup>1090 </sup> <n>of Bilhah</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> בְּנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>and with the sons</n> זִלְפָּ֖ה <sup>2153 </sup> <n>of Zilpah</n> נְשֵׁ֣י <sup>802 </sup> <n>wives</n> אָבִ֑יו <sup>1 </sup> <n>his father's</n> וַיָּבֵ֥א <sup>935 </sup> <n>brought</n> יוֹסֵ֛ף <sup>3130 </sup> <n>and Joseph</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> דִּבָּתָ֥ם <sup>1681 </sup> <n>report</n> רָעָ֖ה <sup>7451 </sup> <n>their evil</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> אֲבִיהֶֽם׃ <sup>1 </sup> <n>unto his father</n>
3: וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Now Israel</n> אָהַ֤ב <sup>157 </sup> <n>loved</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יוֹסֵף֙ <sup>3130 </sup> <n>Joseph</n> מִכָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> בָּנָ֔יו <sup>1121 </sup> <n>more than all his children</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> בֶן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>because he [was] the son</n> זְקֻנִ֥ים <sup>2208 </sup> <n>of his old age</n> ה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> ל֑וֹ וְעָ֥שָׂה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and he made</n> ל֖וֹ כְּתֹ֥נֶת <sup>3801 </sup> <n>him a coat</n> פַּסִּֽים׃ <sup>6446 </sup> <n>of [many] colours</n>
4: וַיִּרְא֣וּ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>saw</n> אֶחָ֗יו <sup>251 </sup> <n>And when his brethren</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אֹת֞וֹ <sup>853 </sup> אָהַ֤ב <sup>157 </sup> <n>loved</n> אֲבִיהֶם֙ <sup>1 </sup> <n>that their father</n> מִכָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אֶחָ֔יו <sup>251 </sup> <n>him more than all his brethren</n> וַֽיִּשְׂנְא֖וּ <sup>8130 </sup> <n>they hated</n> אֹת֑וֹ <sup>853 </sup> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יָכְל֖וּ <sup>3201 </sup> <n>him and could</n> דַּבְּר֥וֹ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>not speak</n> לְשָׁלֹֽם׃ <sup>7965 </sup> <n>peaceably</n>
5: וַיַּחֲלֹ֤ם <sup>2492 </sup> <n>dreamed</n> יוֹסֵף֙ <sup>3130 </sup> <n>And Joseph</n> חֲל֔וֹם <sup>2472 </sup> <n>a dream</n> וַיַּגֵּ֖ד <sup>5046 </sup> <n>and he told</n> לְאֶחָ֑יו <sup>251 </sup> <n>[it] his brethren</n> וַיּוֹסִ֥פוּ <sup>3254 </sup> <n>him yet the more</n> ע֖וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>even</n> שְׂנֹ֥א <sup>8130 </sup> <n>and they hated</n> אֹתֽוֹ׃ <sup>853 </sup>
6: וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And he said</n> אֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> שִׁמְעוּ־ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>unto them Hear</n> נָ֕א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>Please</n> הַחֲל֥וֹם <sup>2492 </sup> <n>which I have dreamed</n> הַזֶּ֖ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>to this</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> חָלָֽמְתִּי׃ <sup>2492 </sup> <n>have had</n>

8: וַיֹּ֤אמְרוּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> לוֹ֙ אֶחָ֔יו <sup>251 </sup> <n>And his brethren</n> הֲמָלֹ֤ךְ <sup>4427 </sup> <n>to him Shalt thou indeed</n> תִּמְלֹךְ֙ <sup>4427 </sup> <n>reign</n> עָלֵ֔ינוּ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>Or</n> מָשׁ֥וֹל <sup>4910 </sup> <n>over us? or shalt thou indeed</n> תִּמְשֹׁ֖ל <sup>4910 </sup> <n>have dominion</n> בָּ֑נוּ וַיּוֹסִ֤פוּ <sup>3254 </sup> <n>him yet the more</n> עוֹד֙ <sup>5750 </sup> <n>even</n> שְׂנֹ֣א <sup>8130 </sup> <n>over us? And they hated</n> אֹת֔וֹ <sup>853 </sup> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> חֲלֹמֹתָ֖יו <sup>2472 </sup> <n>for his dreams</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> דְּבָרָֽיו׃ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>and for his words</n>
9: וַיַּחֲלֹ֥ם <sup>2492 </sup> <n>And he dreamed</n> עוֹד֙ <sup>5750 </sup> <n>still</n> חֲל֣וֹם <sup>2472 </sup> <n>dream</n> אַחֵ֔ר <sup>312 </sup> <n>yet another</n> וַיְסַפֵּ֥ר <sup>5608 </sup> <n>and told</n> אֹת֖וֹ <sup>853 </sup> לְאֶחָ֑יו <sup>251 </sup> <n>it his brethren</n> וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> הִנֵּ֨ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Lo</n> חָלַ֤מְתִּֽי <sup>2492 </sup> <n>Behold I have dreamed</n> חֲלוֹם֙ <sup>2472 </sup> <n>a dream</n> ע֔וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>still</n> וְהִנֵּ֧ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>and behold</n> הַשֶּׁ֣מֶשׁ <sup>8121 </sup> <n>more and behold the sun</n> וְהַיָּרֵ֗חַ <sup>3394 </sup> <n>and the moon</n> וְאַחַ֤ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>a</n> עָשָׂר֙ <sup>6240 </sup> <n>ten</n> כּֽוֹכָבִ֔ים <sup>3556 </sup> <n>stars</n> מִֽשְׁתַּחֲוִ֖ים <sup>7812 </sup> <n>made obeisance</n> לִֽי׃
